程序包 com.lef.scanner

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    BeaconConnectionCallback
    An interface for an Android Activity that wants to interact with iBeacons.
    IBeaconConsumer
    An interface for an Android Activity or Service that wants to interact with iBeacons.
    MonitorNotifier
    回调接口，需要实现回调接口中的方法，触发进入，离开某个自定义的regionRegion This interface is implemented by classes that receive iBeacon monitoring notifications
    RangeNotifier
    回调接口，需要实现回调接口中的方法，以接收扫描到的自定义的regionRegion中的beacon This interface is implemented by classes that receive iBeacon ranging notifications
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    BaseSettings
    基本配置类，包括beacon的发射功率和发射频率
    BeaconConnection
    * An class for an Android Activity that wants to interact with iBeacons.
    IBeacon
    The IBeacon class represents a single hardware iBeacon detected by an Android device.
    IBeaconData  
    IBeaconManager
    An class used to set up interaction with iBeacons from an Activity or Service.
    Region
    自定义一个区域，这个区域可以通过uuid、major、minor属性过滤掉不符合的条件 的beacon。
  • 枚举概要 
    枚举 说明
    BaseSettings.AdvertisingInterval
    广播频率
    VERYHIGH(0),HIGH(1),MEDIUM(2),LOW(3),VERYLOW(4),MIN(5),UNKNOWN(6);
    0:100ms
    1:300ms
    2:500ms
    3:1s
    4:2s
    5:5s
    BaseSettings.TransmitPower
    发射功率
    MAX(0),VERYHIGH(1),HIGH(2),MEDIUM(3),LOW(4),VERYLOW(5),MIN(6),UNKNOWN(7);
    0:4dbm
    1:0dbm
    2:-4dbm
    3:-8dbm
    4:-12dbm
    5:-16dbm
    6:-20dbm
